paragraph.text: Sengoku High is a school that lives on the blockchain with 7,777 fighters ready to be enrolled. Each fighter is original, come with its own style and weapons.

In the year 2050, Hayato, a 17 year old boy who has attended 20 schools that always ended up getting kicked out for starting fights. After getting expelled from his 20th school and couldn't find another school that would accept him, Hayato thought it's a God sent when he encountered a mysterious lady, Megumi, who proposed to help him enroll into a school.

Sengoku High, infamous for having many students like him, who have been rejected by other high schools for troublemaking, except in this school, everyone possesses supernatural powers. And it turned out that Hayato possesses power that he never knew.
Sengoku High is ruled by the principal, Nomura Oda, along with 4 section lords under him. And thus begins a story filled with rivaling schools’ fights with weapons and supernatural powers…

features.title: Hayato
features.text: A reckless shonen that possesses special power

features.title: Kenji
features.text: Master of Sword Style in Sengoku High

features.title: Akira
features.text: Master of Stealth Style in Sengoku High

features.title: Ogawa
features.text: Master of Spell Style in Sengoku High

features.title: Makiyo
features.text: Master of Summon Style in Sengoku High

Styles.title: Styles
Styles.description1: There four fighting styles, each has their own pros and cons. Choose your style!

features.title: Swordman
features.text: Swordman specializes in melee attacks, whether with weapons or just plain old fists and is the most skilled with the swords and katana weapons.

features.title: Ninja
features.text: Assassins have higher skill sets in the areas of stealth, sneaking, and smaller, quicker weaponsbut usually begins with lower defensive stats than other classes.

features.title: Magician
features.text: Mages do their damage from long range with fire, ice, and other spell use as opposed to close quarters, where they’re usually susceptible to damage.

features.title: Summoner
features.text: Summoners are known for their ability to summon magical beasts to fight using their special magic.

texts.title: And More
texts.text: Every characters are equipped with a combination of gears that has rarity ranging from common to mythic
Character's total power level scales with combined items' rarity
Character's rarity will contribute to our game mechanics; PvP, future contests and raffles
Stay tune for more detail TBA!

Team.title: Team
Team.description2: We are developing a project that revolves around anime style content and our objective is to create a NFT that is not just a regular token, but something that has utility in our project ecosystem that we are creating.

paragraph.text: Sengoku High is a school that lives on the blockchain with 7,777 fighters ready to be enrolled. Each fighter is original, come with its own style and weapons.
